snippet: Sbarro is banking on a new pizza recipe and fresher ingredients to transform itself into a “fast casual” restaurant chain like Panera Bread and Qdoba.
abstract: Sbarro is hoping to elevate its restaurants in consumers' minds with better pizza, introducing a new recipe and fresher ingredients to transform itself into a 'fast casual' chain; firm emerged from bankruptcy in 2011 and had $650 million in 2012 worldwide sales, including $420 million in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Sbarro is banking on a new pizza recipe and fresher ingredients to transform itself into a “fast casual” restaurant chain like Panera Bread and Qdoba.

headline.seo: New Sbarro Pizza Recipe to Drive Chain’s Turnaround Plans
headline.main: Sbarro Plan for Growth Is Starting in Kitchen
